Posts.Content: Hi, It’s midnight and I’m tired, but I can’t sleep. I went to my Dr’s 2 days ago and told her about an aching feeling I’ve had in my right breast, under my arm and in my shoulder blade. She examined me and said that she thought my right breast felt slightly more ‘glandular’, but wanted to refer me to the local breast clinic for further investigation. My Mom, two maternal Aunties and maternal Nan all have BRCA2. Both of my Aunties were diagnosed with breast cancer at 40. One passed away 2 years ago, and my other Auntie has just been diagnosed with Liver Cancer. I’ve not been tested for the gene yet as I’m not quite 30, but with my family history the Dr wanted to make sure all was ok. I can’t stop thinking about it and whether this is it for me :(.Â  Has anyone else had any experience like this? I don’t feel as though I can tell anyone about it as I don’t want to worry anyone, especially with my Auntie being so recently re-diagnosed.
Posts.Title: Worried I might have Breast Cancer
